column2: Description = c("Replace a value in a vector based on a condition.",

Summary of Data Management Functions
Function Description Example
replace(x, condition, replacement) Replace a value in a vector based on a condition. x <- 1:10; replace(x, x %in% c(2, 5, 7), 0)
read.table('path/to/file.csv', sep = ',') Import a dataset. my_data <- read.table('data/mtcars.csv', sep = ',')
cbind(x,y)/rbind(x,y) Combine data column- or row-wise. x <- 1:5; y <- 6:10; cbind(x, y); rbind(x,y)
merge(x, y, by = 'linking_var') Join data by a linking variable. data1 <- data.frame(survey_id = 1:5, wage = rnorm(5, mean = 15, sd = 5)) data2 <- data.frame(survey_id = 5:1, experience = rnorm(5, mean = 5, sd = 3)) data_merge <- merge(data1, data2, by = 'survey_id')
